sentence.Network_en: He does not intend to relinquish power.
He was forced to relinquish control of the company.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被迫放弃对公司的控制权。

sentence.Network_en: He was forced to relinquish control of the company.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被迫放弃公司的掌控权.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...词源: linquere(L.), to leave, depart from 留下, 离去relinquish v. 放弃, 放手lip 1
relinquish【阿姨放弃林区爱上海】  rein【阿姨在里面用缰绳驾驭】  crocodilian【李纹用低廉的鳄鱼皮包】  tenant【十个蚂蚁是房客】  absent【一被派遣,就会缺席.
give... ... To desist from;stop: 停止；结束： To part with;relinquish: 让出；放弃： give in To hand in;submit: 递交；呈送：.
肺癌死亡人数在增多。10. relinquish vt. 交出, 让给; （尤指不情愿地）放弃例句：He was forced to relinquish control of the comp.

list.abs: refuge 避难所relinquishing mother 放弃责任的母亲restraining order 限制令
relinquish 放弃; 撤回; 停止; 放弃,废除; relinquish to 让与; 让与权力; 财产; relinquish power 交出权力; formally relinquish 正式放弃(权力、高位等〕.
upon entering the physical universe , you relinquished your remembrance of yourself .在进入物质宇宙时，你放弃了对自己的记忆。
i had relinquished all hope that she was alive ., 我已经放弃了她还活着的一切希望.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French relinquiss-, lengthened stem of relinquir, from Latin relinquere, from re- (expressing intensive force) + linquere 'to leave'

entry.def: If you relinquish something such as power or control, you give it up.

example.ex: He does not intend to relinquish power.

means.word_mean: 1. part with a possession or right;

sentences.sentence: "I am relinquishing my bedroom to the long-term house guest"

means.word_mean: 2. relinquish to the power of another; yield to the control of another
3. do without or cease to hold or adhere to;

sentences.sentence: "Let go of the door handle, please!"
"relinquish your grip on the rope--you won't fall"

auth_sentence.content: Monday the president called on him to relinquish power.
auth_sentence.res_content: Monday the president called on him to relinquish power.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Monday the president called on him to relinquish power.

auth_sentence.content: But Mr. Gbagbo has refused to relinquish power.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Mr. Gbagbo has refused to relinquish power.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Mr. Gbagbo has refused to relinquish power.

auth_sentence.content: Deeply entrenched institutions are not going to relinquish power easily.
auth_sentence.res_content: Deeply entrenched institutions are not going to relinquish power easily.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Deeply entrenched institutions are not going to relinquish power easily.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"回,向后,相反,不"; 2. 表示"一再,重新"

stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+pugn打+ant……的→[把人]打回去→[行为]令人厌恶的
re回,向后,相反,不+son声音+ant……的→声音回过来→回响的
re反+vers转+e→反转的
re一再,重新+splend光辉+ent……的→再光辉→辉煌的
re回,向后,相反,不+neg否认+ade个人或集体→反过来否认原的[党]→背叛者
re回,向后,相反,不+peal驱动→反驱动→取消;参考:appeal呼吁
re不+prob正直+ate人→不正直→败坏
re向后+st站→立于后面者→其他的[人,物]
re一再,重新+cidiv掉下+ism行为,现象→再次掉入罪行
re一再,重新+pose放→再放下[工作]→休息
re一再,重新+surg升起,浪潮+ence表名词→重起浪潮→复兴
re回,向后,相反,不+proach接近→不接近→指责
re反+volt转→反过转→反叛
re回+call喊;想→回想
re回+flect弯曲→弯曲返回→反射
re回,向后,相反,不+linqu离开+ish表动词→离开不再要→放弃
re回,向后,相反,不+mov运动,移动+e→移开,消除
re回,向后,相反,不+pel推→击退
re反+sent感觉→反感→不满
re反+sist站→反着站→反抗
re回+tract拉→拉回,缩回
re回+treat→v.后退,撤退
re一再,重新+arrange安排→v.重新安排
re一再,重新+assure确保→v.消除某人疑虑
re一再,重新+capit头+ulate=ate表动词→重新把头拿出来→概括要点
re一再,重新+claim喊→喊回来→取回,引申为开垦荒地
re一再,重新+commend赞扬→一再赞扬
re一再,重新+furbish装饰→再装饰→刷新
re一再,重新+in入+carn肉+ate表动词→重新进入肉体→产生
re一再,重新+in入+state国家,权力→重新进入权力
re一再,重新+iterate重说→反复重说

stems_affixes.value_cn: 描述,表示,象征;代表;阐明
stems_affixes.word_buile: re一再+present出席的;上演→一再上演,出席的→象征;代表
re一再,重新+produce生产,制造→v. 生殖;再现;繁殖;复制
re一再,重新+verber震动+ate表动词→重新震动→起回声

sentences.en: She has relinquished the post to her cousin, Sir Edward.
sentences.cn: 她把职位让给了表弟爱德华爵士。

sentences.en: They will never voluntarily relinquish their independence.
sentences.cn: 他们绝对不会自动放弃独立。

sentences.en: He was forced to relinquish control of the company.
sentences.cn: 他被迫放弃公司的掌控权。

sentences.en: He’s relinquished his claim to the throne.
sentences.cn: 他放弃了继承王位的要求。
